verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: accused] [ARG1: immigrants in Europe] [ARG2: of " violently " changing the culture on Monday] and said people should be wary of the same thing happening in the United States , as his administration faced heavy pressure to stop separating children from their parents at the U.S .- Mexico border.</p >
